(static) arc(frame, radius, minAngle, maxAngle)

Creates an arc centred at the origin of the frame; The arc is created in the xy-plane of the local coordinate system
Parameters:
Name Type Description
frame
radius float Radius of the arc
minAngle float Starting angle in degrees
maxAngle float Ending angle in degrees

(static) getFrames(curve, tList, upVector) → {array}
